Sending your $XRP or $XLM from your Ledger to a #crypto exchange?  Don't forget to add a Destination Tag for #XRP or a Memo ID for #XLM! These serve as identifiers, meaning it shows that this XRP or #Stellar belongs to you.  Your #exchange would normally provide you with this.
